project_abstract.cdata: The Cotton Project will provide for the expansion of cotton and maize production in Geita district of Mwanza region by providing fertilizers and other inputs, tractors and maintenance facilities, storage, feeder road construction, a ginnery water supply and related technical and extension services and training. Health and education facilities will also be provided.
